titleStmt.title: The support of the faithful in times of persecution, or, A sermon preach'd in the wilderness to the poor Protestants in France by M. Brousson ... ; faithfully translated from the French.
Confiance du fidèle persécuté. English
titleStmt.author: Brousson, Claude, 1647-1697.
Rogers, Timothy, 1658-1728.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Snowden for Tho. Parkhurst ...,

notesStmt.note: A translation by Timothy Rogers of "La confiance du fidèle persécuté", one of the sermons in "La manne mystique du désert".
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
